products.name: Lunar New Year bunny print silk twill shirt
products.description: In celebration of the Year of the Rabbit, as well as the arrival of Spring, the House presents a wide-ranging selection of colourful ready-to-wear pieces and accessories featuring various renditions of the wistful creature. Animal motifs often feature in Gucci collections, sometimes accompanied by signature emblems or floral patterns as an expression of the House's fascination with the beauty of the natural world.

products.description: In celebration of the Year of the Rabbit, as well as the arrival of Spring, the House presents a wide-ranging selection of colourful ready-to-wear pieces and accessories featuring various renditions of the wistful creature. products.description: In celebration of the Year of the Rabbit, as well as the arrival of Spring, the House presents a wide-ranging selection of colourful ready-to-wear pieces and accessories featuring various renditions of the wistful creature. products.name: adidas x Gucci cotton shirt
products.description: In celebration of the Year of the Rabbit, as well as the arrival of Spring, the House presents a wide-ranging selection of colourful ready-to-wear pieces and accessories featuring various renditions of the wistful creature. Animal motifs often feature in Gucci collections, sometimes accompanied by signature emblems or floral patterns as an expression of the House's fascination with the beauty of the natural world.

products.name: adidas x Gucci print silk bowling shirt
products.description: A second chapter in the adidas and Gucci collection, where the Web continues to juxtapose with the three white stripes and the GG monogram combines with the Trefoil. Inspired by the '80s and '90s, emblematic House’s motifs mix with those of the historic sportswear brand adidas resulting in a series of hybrid looks. This bowling shirt is crafted from yellow and black silk with the GG Trefoil poppies print.

products.name: Gucci HA HA HA silk shirt
products.description: Signature pieces come alive with bright colors and playful motifs as part of the Gucci HA HA HA collection. The result of an inventive two-person journey between Gucci’s Creative Director, Alessandro Michele, and the British singer-songwriter and actor, Harry Styles. Part of the collection, this shirt is crafted from brown silk georgette.

products.name: adidas x Gucci striped cotton shirt
products.description: adidas and Gucci venture into a collection, where the Web juxtaposes with the three white stripes, and the GG monogram combines with the trefoil. Inspired by the ‘80s and ‘90s, emblematic House’s motifs mix with those of the historic sportswear brand adidas resulting in a series of hybrid looks. This cotton shirt features the Gucci Trefoil print.

products.name: Gucci HA HA HA G check shirt
products.description: Signature pieces come alive with bright colors and playful motifs as part of the Gucci HA HA HA collection. The result of an inventive two-person journey between Gucci’s Creative Director, Alessandro Michele, and the British singer-songwriter and actor, Harry Styles. Part of the collection, this shirt is crafted from light blue G check silk crêpe. .

products.name: Washed stripe cotton shirt
products.description: A concept continuously explored by the House, tailor-inspired pieces combine sartorial excellence and an eclectic vision. This washed striped cotton shirt has mother of pearl buttons.

products.name: adidas x Gucci Oxford cotton shirt
products.description: Emblematic House’s motifs mix with those of the historic sportswear brand adidas. The collection sees both heritages encoded in a trio of lines, where adidas and Gucci combine archival emblems. The House pulls memories from the ‘80s and ‘90s for a collection that is both nostalgia-driven and contemporary. This Oxford cotton shirt is finished with the Gucci Trefoil embroidery on the front.

products.name: adidas x Gucci macro GG bowling shirt
products.description: adidas and Gucci venture into a collection, where the Web juxtaposes with the three white stripes, and the GG monogram combines with the trefoil. Pulling inspiration from the Creative Director’s memories of the ‘80s and ‘90s, emblematic House’s motifs mix with those of the historic sportswear brand adidas resulting in a series of hybrid looks. This macro GG Trefoil print bowling shirt has a straight hem and side vents.

products.name: Printed cotton poplin bowling shirt
products.description: Pursuing the concept of escapism and faraway destination, Gucci Love Parade presents a series of pieces inspired by travel to warm places. Prints recalling typical souvenir designs, create playful yet elegant ready-to-wear pieces.

products.name: Printed cotton bowling shirt
products.description: Pursuing the concept of escapism and faraway destination, Gucci Love Parade presents a series of pieces inspired by travel to warm places. Prints recalling typical souvenir designs, create playful yet elegant ready-to-wear pieces.

products.name: Horsebit jacquard cotton shirt
products.description: The universe of evening wear is deeply explored, including styles infused with the emblematic Horsebit pattern presented in a sophisticated and subtle tone.

products.name: Cotton striped shirt with embroidery
products.description: The warm-weather spirit can be felt throughout Gucci Love Parade, with styles crafted in cooler fabrics and softer hues. A mix of texture adds unexpected dimension and evokes a feeling of escape and travel. This striped cotton shirt is finished with the Double G embroidery, adding a subtle House code.

products.name: Striped cotton boxy shirt
products.description: In a more relaxed fit this striped Oxford cotton shirt speaks to the Gucci concept of tailoring that permeates each collection.

products.name: Cotton poplin shirt
products.description: A concept continuously explored by the Creative Director, tailor-inspired pieces combine sartorial excellence and an eclectic vision. This cotton poplin shirt has a point collar, a now recognisable detail of the House.

products.name: Double G cotton striped shirt
products.description: Socialites from the 1970s represent a strong source of inspiration for Alessandro Michele, resulting in a series of tailored looks. Archival details, like the striped Double G pattern on this shirt, show the long-standing tradition of the House.

products.name: Cotton poplin embroidered shirt
products.description: This crisp white shirt is finished with a subtle Gucci floral embroidery, which combines the tailoring influence with the romantic feel of the collection.

products.name: Cotton silk poplin shirt
products.description: A button front shirt crafted from crisp, white cotton poplin. Items inspired by classic tailoring continue to be revisited through the Gucci lens.

products.name: Cotton GG striped shirt
products.description: Paying homage to the city that created a fascination with the movie industry and pop culture, Gucci Love Parade takes inspiration from Hollywood's glamour. The collection balances contemporary layering of casual garments with sartorial ones, like this thin striped GG cotton shirt.

products.name: Double G cotton popeline shirt
products.description: Socialites from the 1970s represent a strong source of inspiration for Alessandro Michele, resulting in a series of tailored looks. Bold new colour palettes mix with archival details and show the long-standing tradition of the House. This crisp cotton shirt has a subtle Double G embroidery detail.

products.name: Cotton shirt with Double G
products.description: Socialites from the 1970s represent a strong source of inspiration for Alessandro Michele, resulting in a series of tailored looks. Bold new colour palettes mix with archival details and show the long-standing tradition of the House. This crisp cotton shirt has a subtle Double G embroidery detail.

products.name: Double G cotton poplin shirt
products.description: Socialites from the 1970s represent a strong source of inspiration for Alessandro Michele, resulting in a series of tailored looks. Bold new colour palettes mix with archival details and show the long-standing tradition of the House. This crisp cotton shirt has a subtle Double G embroidery detail.

products.name: Geometric houndstooth print bowling shirt
products.description: For Gucci Cosmogonie, colours, and logos clash to create new identifying symbols. A mix of colours and textures overlap to form new, unconventional designs. This bowling shirt is crafted in blue and red geometric houndstooth printed cloth with a green and red Web Interlocking G stripe.

products.name: Striped cotton shirt with patch
products.description: A collection of styles from the Gucci Cosmogonie collection showcase the Gucci logo in a script in different color combinations. Here, the logo is embroidered in red and white and is placed on the sleeve of this striped cotton button-down short sleeve shirt.

products.name: Cotton poplin shirt with embroidery
products.description: The Gucci Cosmogonie collection was presented against the backdrop of the historic Castel del Monte in Italy. A small jester hat with Interlocking G embroidery decorates this shirt as a nod to the collection.

products.name: Printed silk bowling shirt
products.description: A tonal flourish of intricate botanics, knights, kings, equestrian details and prancing horses decorate these silk shorts. A black band frames the design with a graphic element, almost like the border of a traditional silk carré.

products.name: Cotton shirt with Gucci Boutique
products.description: Crafted from white cotton with a button closure and button through cuffs. The Boutique lil coupé logo placed at the side has an intrinsic vintage feel.

products.name: Oxford cotton shirt
products.description: Shapes that reflect styles from the ‘70s are mixed and layered with silhouettes rooted in the now. Designed with a vintage inspired point collar and enriched by a Double G embroidery, this light blue Oxford cotton shirt has a rounded bottom hem.

products.name: Oxford cotton shirt
products.description: Shapes that reflect styles from the ‘70s are mixed and layered with silhouettes rooted in the now. Designed with a vintage inspired shape and enriched by a GG embroidery, this light blue Oxford cotton shirt has contrast piping around the collar.

products.name: Cotton poplin shirt with embroidery
products.description: Tiny embroideries appear throughout the Gucci universe, adding a playful twist to ready-to-wear pieces and accessories from the Spring Summer 2023 collection. Here, this light blue cotton poplin shirt with point collar and short sleeves features a delicate Gucci piglet embroidery, a recurrent detail of this season.

products.name: Gucci Link to Love bracelet with 'Gucci' bar
products.description: The Gucci Link to Love collection explores modern romance, characterizing new symbols of love. The collection includes different gold tones enriched with precious stones and finishes that blend the lines between masculine and feminine. Each piece inspires individualized ways to wear with stackable and layered features. This 18k yellow gold bracelet features a black enamel bar pendant with 'Gucci' engraving.

products.name: Icon 18k star ring
products.description: This precious ring is presented in 18k rose gold with a delicate band featuring the GG motif. The piece's focal point are the cut-out stars, that recall the Gucci Cosmogonie fashion show. Taking place beneath the night sky at the Italian Castel del Monte, the collection draws inspiration from star constellations.

products.description: The latest silhouettes for the Icon line offer new refined and contemporary executions of signature pieces. Intricate engraved details offer a magical touch, such as the heart motif that continues to appear as a beloved symbol of the House alongside the emblematic GG motif. Here both symbols appear as part of this precious ring in 18k white gold.
